name: Crap Circlz
description:
In Crap circlz, you play as two aliens trying to obtain their crop circle’s license. 

Use a farmer’s field to reproduce the drawing as accurately as possible while preserving the farmer’s harvest. 

Instruction 

Game controller recommended, but keyboards should work fine. 

Detailed controls are in the game. 

Feel free to send us bug reports and feddbacks. 

The team 

- François Dervaux (Code) 

- Guillaume Lemarchand (3D Art)
